name: Bloom (itch) (Sweetiebe11e)
description:
You can walk, jump, and wall grab as a flower. It is possible to play on your own with AWSD or invite a friend to use <^v>. If you play on your own, just leave player 2 behind, they should be safe. Be careful because both players share 3 hearts.

Collect gems and make your way through the forest, avoiding weed killer and bud enemies along the way, alternatively you can try to smash the enemies.
